https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/96rMODu54mLBVs3lqkwhQje3QCJ.jpg A warm tale of friendship forged between a lonely boy Agi and an elderly lady Ema. Abandoned by everyone, these two outcast manage to unite and overcome harsh reality. Agi and Ema
